desc: Urban Enchantment Candle Co is a eco friendly based candle company that strives on relaxation and aromatherapy while also using sustainable items in our products to reduce our carbon footprint so we can co-exist with our beautiful planet!! All of our candles are vegan (free of stearic acid and beeswax) phthalate free a

layout.text: At Urban Enchantment Candle Co. We believe in brightening up any room and transforming any space into a tranquil calming journey that will take you to a place of absolute bliss no matter how crazy the day has been.
